On this date May 22, 1959 in Davyhulme, Urmston, United Kingdom, Steven Patrick Morrissey was born, one of the most important public figures of his generation. Not only for his four decades long artistic presence, first with the Smiths and then solo, but also for his uniquely courageous attitude towards political and social issues. This has led to him being characterised as â€œracistâ€, â€œfar-rightâ€ etc. by the usual ignorant politically correct circles.

Morrissey is one of the very few people in todayâ€™s show business for whom I feel love and deep appreciation.

I made a podcast with songs from the Smithsâ€™ and Morrisseyâ€™s albums.
